Hi, I'm Racem

I am currently a third-year engineering student at The University of TEK-UP. I spend my day working on projects with TypeScript, React.js, Angular, Node.js, Java, Spring Boot, and AWS.

My Projects

Web Site Enterprise

    Made with:

During my summer internship, I built a web enterprise platform focused on security and usability. Key achievements include:
- Developed a platform for user management, services, and dynamic content to streamline business operations.
- Created a webmaster dashboard with Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) and conditional rendering based on roles, enhancing security with HTTP-only cookies.

Code

Real Estate rental Management wWebsite.

    Made with:

During my summer internship, I designed and developed a real estate rental management website with key features including:
-Admin Dashboard: Managed property listings, user profiles, and platform analytics.
-Customer Interface: Enabled seamless property browsing, viewing, and reservations.
-Enhanced Usability: Delivered a responsive, user-friendly experience.

Code

MR Green

    Made with:

The "Mr. Green" project is an online platform promoting environmental sustainability through recycling, event creation, and community engagement. It addresses challenges like low awareness and poor communication by offering educational campaigns, recycling information, real-time chat, and IoT-based smart trash solutions.
Key features include event participation, complaint handling, map consultations, and account management, all focused on security, performance, scalability, and accessibility.

Code

Online platform for Tunisian artisans

    Made with:

This project created an online platform for Tunisian artisans to showcase and sell their creations, improving visibility and connecting them with craft enthusiasts. It addresses challenges like reaching a wider audience and managing resources. The platform includes artisan profiles, product catalogs, event reservations, and secure payments.
Key features include user account management, secure authentication, and an event calendar, aiming to empower artisans and support the growth of the sector.

Code

Hotel Mangement

    Made with:

Developed a hotel management system consisting of a Spring Boot API and a mobile application built with Android Studio. The solution enables the admin to efficiently manage all aspects of the hotel, including customer details, employees, resources, and events .... The app also provides functionalities to consult various hotel statistics for better decision-making and operational oversight. This comprehensive platform ensures streamlined operations and enhanced visibility across hotel management tasks..

Code

Authentification-JWT-and-simple-crud

    Made with:

The "Authentication with JWT and Simple CRUD" project uses Node.js to implement secure user authentication with JSON Web Tokens (JWT) for authorization. It also features a simple CRUD system for managing user data and resources.

Code

Web site and Mobile app E-commerce

    Made with:

As part of my end-of-studies project, I led the development, modeling, and documentation of a Web and Mobile E-Commerce application, primarily using Spring Boot, Thymeleaf, and Flutter. Additionally, I utilized Yield Management, a strategy focused on maximizing revenue through pricing adjustments..
